name: Action Pack: Armed Forces Corp. and Terrorist Takedown 2
summary: Armed Forces Corp - Mercenaries. Superbly equipped and armed, trained to fight in all conditions possible. Incredibly effective and showing no mercy to opponents. Only one thing makes them different from commandoes they fight for *. Become a commander of a mercenaries unit, hired by the government for an exceptionally difficult mission. A group of terrorists intend to steal top secret data from the computer of an influential politician. Dont let the criminals get away with the stolen documents. Terrorist Takedown 2 - Journalists have been taken prisoner! Two days after the kidnapping the government begins negotiations with the terrorists demanding the release of the captives. With the conditions being impossible to meet it would appear that there are no options left for the negotiation team. Secretly, a special forces unit is dispatched to try and secure the safe * of the hostages. As a US Navy Seals soldier it is not only your task to * the hostages from the hands of the terrorists but you must also make it back alive.
